arts.ttl: Arne Slot speaks about Eintracht Frankfurt's form
arts.sum: “I don't think they played regularly in the Champions League but last season they were there in the Europa League and came quite far. “I think not only [Hugo] likes to go back over there, I think the fans over there like to see him as well for what he did for the club, because he was part of the team that brought them to the Champions League .

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt v Liverpool: 4 players in crisis ahead of CL clash, annoyance growing
arts.sum: Liverpool will look to bounce back from four consecutive defeats when they face Eintracht Frankfurt in the Champions League on Wednesday. The German club have also struggled since the start of September, winning only two of their seven matches. arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs Liverpool – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Liverpool travel to Germany on Wednesday aiming to halt an alarming four-match losing streak when they face Eintracht Frankfurt in the Champions League. Arne Slot’s side have suffered consecutive defeats in league and European action. Conversely, Frankfurt possess a formidable home record in continental competition, setting up a vital matchday three encounter for both clubs. arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Liverpool: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Over the summer they signed Hugo Ekitiké from Frankfurt, and he has enjoyed a promising start to life on Merseyside with five goals in 11 games in all competitions, although he has yet to hit the back of the net in the Champions League for them. Ekitiké has scored five times for Liverpool since joining the club from Frankfurt in the summer – more than any of his team-mates so far this season.

arts.ttl: Liverpool's Champions League plans for Eintracht Frankfurt clash are disrupted after plane suffers technical problems - leaving Reds stranded at airport for FOUR HOURS
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE IN FRANKFURT: Liverpool experienced major travel disruption on Tuesday night as their flight to Frankfurt was halted due to technical difficulties with the plane.
